PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2013-13722013-12-12,  ,  ,  PS, 
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectOrder No. 166 - (Nova Scotia) Provincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER NO. 166 which makes a declaration of federal concern and authorizes the federal government to provide financial assistance to the province of NOVA SCOTIA with respect to the FLOODING causing damage to homes and provincial and municipal infrastructure in the counties of Colchester and Pictou from September 22 to 24, 2012.
AttachmentsAttachment
